sentence:
Original sentence: "It said its medical delegate had assured athletes that weather conditions would be monitored all day and reported to the teams "to ensure the event is run at an acceptable level of health risk."" 
 Translated sentence: "它说,它的医疗代表向运动员保证,天气状况将受到全天监测,并向小组报告,"以确保活动在可以接受的健康风险水平上进行"。"

Original sentence: "Five goals in two games should be a memorable feat, but Bam, 27, said she was not sure if she had ever done the same thing." 
 Translated sentence: "两场比赛中的五个目标应该是一个令人难忘的壮举，但27岁的巴姆说，她不知道她是否做过同样的事。"

Original sentence: "One of the patients described it as "painful." Sean Anderson Corona, 13, underwent stem cell therapy when he was diagnosed with Stage 4 Neuroblastoma - a cancer often found in the adrenal glands. The boy was hooked up to machines for a daylong process that collects the stem cells from the blood. The blood is then reinfused back into the body." 
 Translated sentence: "其中一名患者将其描述为 “痛苦 ” ， 13 岁的肖恩 · 安德森 · 科纳 （ Sean Anderson Corona ） 在被诊断为第四阶段神经母细胞瘤时接受了干细胞治疗 — — 一种通常在  腺中发现的癌症 ， 这个男孩被连接到机器上进行为期一天的过程 ， 从血液中收集干细胞。"
